description: Gets details about the specified Git repository.

parameters.name: CodeRepositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the Git repository to describe.

nested_items.name: CodeRepositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the Git repository.

nested_items.name: CodeRepositoryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Git repository.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the repository was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the repository was last changed.

nested_items.name: GitConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration details about the repository, including the URL where the repository is located, the default branch, and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret that contains the credentials used to access the repository.

nested_items.name: RepositoryUrl
nested_items.description: The URL where the Git repository is located.

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The default branch for the Git repository.

nested_items.name: SecretArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret that contains the credentials used to access the git repository. The secret must have a staging label of AWSCURRENT and must be in the following format:
